pros: proposed a comprehensive regulation on social media content removal
cons: didn't mention anything about the content publisher or the evidence preservation process

policy: Protecting Consumers from Deceptive AI Act
pros: Enhances transparency, promotes consumer awareness, and aims to reduce the spread of deceptive AI content.
cons: Potential challenges in enforcement and keeping pace with rapidly evolving AI technologies.

policy: REGULATION (EU) 2024/1689 OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL
aim objects: Developers, providers, and users of AI systems within the EU.
pros: specified the deployers should disclose the usage of deepfake and this act dosen't obey the freedom of speech

policy: Regulations on the Administration of Deep Synthesis in Internet Information Services
pros: very comprehensive and clearly defines the regulatory responsibilities for deep synthesis service providers, emphasizes preventing and addressing misinformation. ,Strengthens personal information and biometric data protection.
cons: May impose certain restrictions on technological innovation and application.

pros: Enhances user protection by empowering platforms to preemptively block harmful content; mostly discussed explicit contents
cons: didn't include laws that prevent deepfake in other aspects

aim objects: Online platforms, content creators, and users.
aspect: Generation platform users (i.e. content creators), Telecommunication platform users
pros: Provides legal recourse for victims of non-consensual deepfakes; imposes clear responsibilities on platforms to prevent the spread of harmful content.
cons: Implementation may require significant resources from platforms; balancing content regulation with freedom of expression and privacy rights presents challenges.
